Key Match Events: Stephen Curry scored the final 12 points for the Warriors to will them to a 120-117 victory over Klay Thompson and the Dallas Mavericks
Stephen Curry's 28-foot step-back 3-pointer with 27.5 seconds left gave the Warriors a four-point lead
Stephen Curry's game-sealing free throws capped a season-high 37-point outing
Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson said after competing against his Splash Brother for the first time in an NBA game, 'It hurts to be on the other side of one of his flurries. The guy got hot at the end and made some ridiculous shots and being on the other end, it sucksâ€™
Miscellaneous Highlights: This article discusses the NBA Cup matchups between the Golden State Warriors and the Dallas Mavericks, and the Memphis Grizzlies
Others: The article highlights Stephen Curry's performance in the games, including his points, rebounds, assists, steals, and field goal percentages
